summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services, United States Department of Justice for financial assistance in the amount of One Hundred Thousand Dollars ($100,000) for costs associated with hosting the "When the Heat's On" problem solving conference; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1999 Budget of the Police Department; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
